name: LASTPASS [Admin Console Login]
description: This rule looks for when an admin user logged into the LastPass Admin console. To tune this rule, exclude the list of admin accounts who are authorized for this action.
tags: LastPass,auth,mfa,vault,Defense Evasion,Initial Access,Persistence,Privilege Escalation,Valid Accounts,T1078,Create Account,T1136,Domain Account,T1136.002,md-info
query: class=lastpass action=`login to admin console` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: LASTPASS [Reactivated User]
description: This rule looks for when a user account is re-activated on LastPass. To tune this rule, exclude the list of Admin accounts who are authorized for this action.

name: LASTPASS [Master Password Reuse]
description: This rule looks for when a user LastPass account master password is reused.
query: class=lastpass action=`master password reuse` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: LASTPASS [Multiple Failed Login Attempts]
description: This rule looks for three login failed attempts within five minutes from the same source and username.
query: class=lastpass action=`failed login attempt` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: LASTPASS [Admin Delete]
description: This rule looks for when a LastPass admin user is deleted.
tags: LastPass,auth,mfa,vault,Defense Evasion,Initial Access,Persistence,Privilege Escalation,Valid Accounts,T1078,Impact,Data Destruction,T1485,Create Account,T1136,Domain Account,T1136.002,md-info

name: LASTPASS [Employee Account Deleted]
description: This rule looks for when an employee account is deleted or a user is removed from a company on LastPass. To tune this rule, exclude the list of admin accounts who are authorized for this action.
tags: LastPass,auth,mfa,vault,Defense Evasion,Initial Access,Persistence,Privilege Escalation,Valid Accounts,T1078,Impact,Data Destruction,T1485,Create Account,T1136,Domain Account,T1136.002,md-info
query: class=lastpass action=[`employee account deleted`,`remove user from company`] NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: LASTPASS [Created LastPass Account]
description: This rule looks for when a LastPass account is created. Exclude the list of admin accounts who are authorized for this action.
tags: LastPass,auth,mfa,vault,Defense Evasion,Initial Access,Persistence,Privilege Escalation,Valid Accounts,T1078,Create Account,T1136,Domain Account,T1136.002,md-info
query: class=lastpass action=`created lastpass account` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: LASTPASS [Password moved to shared folders]
description: This rule looks for when a user moves/shares a password for a site on LastPass. To tune this rule, exclude the list of admin accounts who are authorized for this action.
tags: LastPass,auth,mfa,vault,Defense Evasion,Initial Access,Persistence,Privilege Escalation,Valid Accounts,T1078,Create Account,T1136,Domain Account,T1136.002,md-info
query: class=lastpass action=`move to shared folder` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4

name: LASTPASS [Delete Shared Site]
description: This rule looks for when a Shared site and password are deleted on the LastPass environment. Exclude the list of admin accounts who are authorized for this action.
tags: LastPass,auth,mfa,vault,Defense Evasion,Initial Access,Persistence,Privilege Escalation,Valid Accounts,T1078,Impact,Data Destruction,T1485,Create Account,T1136,Domain Account,T1136.002,md-info
query: class=lastpass action=`delete shared sites` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
